Alchemy software limited maintain a very strict privacy policy. There is a great area in privacy policy. You can ask me about 'data privacy policy or data protection rules', 'informing office about any privacy inconvenience or issues', 'hiding identity problem', etc.

An employee must keep the following matters very carefully confidential. 1) All important matters including salary allowance, privacy policy of the employment contract executed with Alchemy Software Limited and the employee. 2) Any work related to the department in which the employee is working or any matter or financial transaction related to the customer.3) There is a possibility of any kind of loss to the organization, customer or any employee working in the organization if any person from outside knows about any internal matter of the organization. 4) Not to discuss about the own facilities with other employees. 5) In case of need of work, the employee is informed and acquired various confidential information, software, miscellaneous matters of the organization and the customer. If such information is misused in any way, providing it to someone by deception will be considered as a crime. 6) Attempting to collect different types of information from another department on purpose will be considered as an offense.

1) If a crime is committed in the office or if there is a possibility that an employee knowingly withholds information, then he / she will be considered as involved in the crime and action will be taken. In that case if an employee does not want to report a crime directly to the management council, he or she can submit it to the office in a designated secret box (where there will be no cameras) or he/she can inform in the email specified under pseudonym. 2) If any employee (current or past) intentionally intends to collect various information (income or expenditure of his organization or a customer, property, product or customer list, salable customer list / update, any other sensitive information), he should inform the management in due time. 3) If any employee of any customer organization of Alchemy Software Limited is personally employed or engaged in business, permission must be given in writing.

NB: '1)The fare for coming or going to the office from one's own home or house cannot be claimed as travel allowance.'
